p: Investigation of the obtained results in Table 1 revealed that the tested spirooxindoles were more effective towards HCC HepG2 cells rather than prostate cancer PC-3 cells, except compounds 6f, 6 m and 6n which caused slightly enhanced growth inhibitory activity against PC-3 (IC 50 = 29.3, 24.3 and 42.8 µM, respectively) than HepG2 cells (IC 50 = 32.7, 30.6 and >50.0 µM, respectively).
